name: Prometheus Rising
description:
A game by Evanski

Made for the GMC Jam 42

Source Code

A Doom clone, made in GMS 2.3,  Includes a read me, having credits for assets.

Not everything I wanted made it in, However I'm pretty happy with what came out.

After major bug after bug, It seems to be Bug free? Yes.

Game includes 4 different fire blasts,

5 different enemies, at least 2 Easter eggs

locked doors, secrets and blood!

Hope you enjoy, might make a post jam version...eventually.
